name: Shrunk'd
description:
Story

You play as two office workers who have gotten their hands on a new prototype device. The device is said to be able to shrink objects.

Krysten and Walter are bummed out when the device doesn't seem to work. They tried to fix it with the tools but accidentally triggered it but this time it shrunk both of them.

Different pieces of the device is flung all around the office. The only way for Krysten and Walter to revert themselves back to their original size is to find the pieces and fix the device.

Features
  • 3 Game profiles
    • saves to current profile on exiting to main menu
  • Soul switching in single player
    • control different characters by switching to them
  • Persistent Data
    • Auto save when going back to main menu
  • Cooperative split screen
    • each player plays a one of two characters
  • Equipment
    • Magnet and Grapple Gun
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Shrunk'd was developed by a team of 3 students as part of the Production Module.

Credits

This game was made by:

  • John David Uy -Producer
  1. Trevor Korber - Group Leader
  2. Vishal Tanwar - Assistant Manager/Asset Manager
  3. Alexander Chiu - Developer
